headline: Focus on AI and growth at a reasonable price, strategist says
summary: Citi analysts recommended that investors look at the growing tech landscape through the lens of "Growth at a Reasonable Price," or GARP, as Wall Street continues to chatter on the likelihood of an AI bubble forming.  Citi Head of US equity strategy Scott Chronert comes on Market Catalysts to talk about how his team is analyzing AI growth. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out moreÂ Market Catalysts.
